name: 汪建民
objective: This course is a special green energy-related topics of Optical, Electrical and Magnetic Properties of Materials, including: 1.Renewable Energy & Solar Potential Overview; 2. Crystal Chemistry and Crystallography (e.g., lattice, crystal structure, and XRD); 3.Electric Property-Semiconductor Physics and Solar Cell; 4. Electrochemical Property--Lithium Ion Rechargeable Battery; 5. Optoelectronic effects-Light-Emitting Diodes ; 6. Magnetic Property-Nano-bits Media for Tera-world
